caller_intent: Nikitan is calling to obtain renewal information for a homeowners policy, including effective/expiration dates, premium amount, coverage details, and payment address verification, and to update the payment address.
resolution_steps: Holly requests policy number, name, address, and insurance company details.
Holly retrieves policy information from the system (Safeco).
Holly confirms renewal dates (9/25/25 to 9/25/26), premium ($3,138), dwelling coverage ($474,600), deductible ($2,500), and mortgage lender (Truest Bank).
Holly updates the payment address from P.O. Box 7952 to P.O. Box 7933 in Springfield, Ohio.
Holly verifies the loan number (6621849377) and confirms the payment address (Safeco P.O. Box 91017, Chicago, IL).
Holly provides the website (www.mycoverageinfor.com/agent) for uploading the declaration page using the loan number, ZIP code, and borrower's last name.
knowledge_required: Accessing and retrieving policy details from insurance systems
Understanding homeowners policy terminology (dwelling coverage, deductible, replacement cost)
Updating payment addresses in policy records
Escrow payment processes for insurance policies
summary: Holly assists Nikitan from SunTrust Insurance Bank with retrieving and confirming details for a Safeco homeowners policy renewal, including updating the payment address and providing a portal link for the declaration page. The caller confirms all information and prepares to proceed with payment.
